p: The hospitalized student (ID No.6) had a peak temperature of 40.0 °C accompanied by a cough, headache, sore throat, and diarrhea. He had a neutrophil count of 78.6% (normal range, 50–70%), a percentage of lymphocytes of 17.8% (normal range, 20–40%), and a white blood cell count of 5.04 × 10 9/L (normal range, 4.0–10.0 × 10 9/L). A chest x-ray showed patchy shadows on the right lung of the hospitalized student.
